subject: Re: [junit] Re: Can i do a assertion inside the setUp() method.
messageBody:
On Jan 14, 2004, at 12:15 PM, <Jeff.Langr@...> wrote:

> My example: All tests in the TestCase create a common file. Before
> running
> the test, you want to ensure the file is gone, otherwise your tests are
> potentially invalid. So my setup includes: assertTrue(new
> File("x").delete());. I could
> put (a method call to) the assertion at the start of each test method,
> but setUp
> provides a more succinct way of eliminating this duplication.
>
> Is there a better way of doing this?
>
> The way I look at it is that setUp and tearDown execute as part of each
> test, not before and after the tests.

+1

Mike
